description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The Borough of Stoke-upon-Trent ... comprising its history, statistics, civil polity, and traffic, with biographical and genealogical notices of eminent individuals; ... also, the Manorial History of Newcastle-under-Lyme, and incidental notices of other neighbouring places and objects ... By J. W. [and S. Shaw]" Author: WARD, John - of Burslem Contributor: SHAW, Simeon. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 1302.l.1."
